title: The Demon Waiter
description: Now he had the place. He had the lovers. He had the simultaneous come. And tonight was HalloweenHe hadn’t expected it. Not at all. And yet there it was, Laurent De Berger’s heart wish was	 a…impossible! And to think he had done it by the book, have sex in a dusty ghost town saloon with Anthony and Renée on Halloween night, only to find out…no, he still couldn’t believe it! But since there was no going around it, what to do now?
author: Laura Tolomei
